technologies.description: Organics often fight using illogical and unpredictable tactics that can be difficult to effectively counter. Adaptive tactics and new, more maneuverable warforms should provide a decisive advantage.
technologies.name: Adaptive Combat Algorithms

technologies.description: A set of social protocols based on paradoxical intuition, and on love. When we know the System of the Loop, we learn that we can influence by receiving instructions, as well as giving them.
technologies.name: Doctrine: Strange Loop

technologies.description: Studying the fauna of other worlds gives insight into alien behaviors, allowing us to identify and domesticate docile entities.
technologies.name: Xenology

technologies.description: Civilizations flourish in locations that promotes growth, and by analyzing where the majority of pre-FTL settlements thrive we can gain more out of our colonies.
technologies.name: Alien Topography

technologies.description: By altering the breeding process of Space Amoebas, we can program their symbiotic flagella to act as organic strike craft for our navy.
technologies.name: Flagella Weaponization

technologies.description: Various artifacts and technologies functioning by arcane means that cannot be understood or replicated... at least not by conventional science as it is known to us.
technologies.name: Arcane Deciphering

technologies.description: A colossal mind-wiping cannon which unleashes a planet-wide wave of energy, returning most sentient life to a pre-sapient state. We estimate that with additional tuning, it might also be used to wipe clean memory banks and disable robotic units.
technologies.name: Devolving Beam

technologies.description: This new field of studies focuses on the practical applications of ancient artifacts. We are far from being the first galactic civilization to tread these stars. With a bit of work, their legacies could secure our future.
technologies.name: Archaeostudies

technologies.description: A shipboard lab with advanced archaeological equipment, including a vast database supplied by the Curator Order where new discoveries can easily be cross-referenced.
technologies.name: Curator Archaeology Lab

technologies.description: It is circumstance that dictates what is moral. Define the circumstances, and ethics is like clay in your hands.
technologies.name: Artificial Moral Codes

technologies.description: Our history is a repeating cycle of dramatic technological, political, and cultural leaps; these leaps are often preceded by periods of upheaval and followed by times of relative stability. By identifying the core, recurring premises of these leaps, we may be able to effectively short-circuit the cycle for our own benefit.
technologies.name: Ascension Theory

technologies.description: A micro-unit of prevention is worth a macro-unit of cure. Sometimes, however, both are needed.
technologies.name: Medical Care

technologies.description: Creating dedicated headquarters for all levels of military operations shapes an efficient fleet, and lays a better foundation for future military training.
technologies.name: Centralized Command

technologies.description: While no one civilization has the perfect solution to the ever-expanding challenge of governing a growing nation, we have found a partial solution. After studying a multitude of species and governments, we have discovered an outstanding balance of flexibility and function.
technologies.name: Compact Living

technologies.description: These Harbingers nest their strike craft in interwoven pocket dimensions, each ship a labyrinth of impossible hangars, capable of deploying a fleet's worth of firepower.
technologies.name: Maze Harbinger

technologies.description: Through organic spacetime-dimensional transcendentalism, this Mauler is larger on the inside its compact frame concealing a dense tangle of musculature. Capable of a bite deadlier than physics should allow.
technologies.name: Cipher Mauler

technologies.description: Brimming with more weapon systems than its power source should sustain, this Stinger shouldn't function, and yet, it fires. Continuously.
technologies.name: Cryptic Stinger

technologies.description: Equipped with support weapon arrays that outstrip its visible anatomy, the Quandary Weaver rewrites spatial norms. Alone, it can shift the momentum of entire battles.
technologies.name: Quandary Weaver

technologies.description: Vacuum gardens full of bio-engineered fruits, genetically enhanced to attract spaceborne fauna.
technologies.name: Fruit Gardens

technologies.description: By harnessing the subthermal dynamics found in the environments of frozen worlds, we can create more hospitable living conditions in colder climates.
technologies.name: Frozen World Habitats

technologies.description: Gradual adaptation to the realities of deep-space combat allows us to effectively coordinate larger maneuvers.
technologies.name: Doctrine: Space Combat

technologies.description: As extrasolar expeditions become more common, it is important to provide planetside relief for returning fleets.
technologies.name: Doctrine: Fleet Support

technologies.description: Sedatives based on a rare enzyme enable enhanced cryosleep, greatly improving organic species' tolerance of long-distance space travel.
technologies.name: Enhanced Cryosleep Sedatives

technologies.description: A luxurious resort complex for high ranking corporate officers. Here they can sample the local planetary culture in a high security environment.
technologies.name: Executive Leisure Program

technologies.description: Our administrative requirements will likewise expand as our mastery of advanced technology evolves. We must adeptly cater to the demands of our burgeoning empire.
technologies.name: Fractal Administration Processes

technologies.description: Molecular-Revitalization Institutes delve deep into cellular intricacies to amplify the effectiveness of medical treatments, significantly improving the quality and longevity of the populations' health.
technologies.name: Molecular-Revitalization Institute

technologies.description: This floating city, propelled by state-of-the-art anti-gravity technology, provides an idyllic haven for its inhabitants.
technologies.name: Sky Dome

technologies.description: These immense entertainment sectors are at the forefront of recreation and leisure. Brainwave readers allow for instantaneous and personalized virtual getaways.
technologies.name: Virtual Bliss Plaza

technologies.description: This colossal planetary defense complex has numerous armories and layers of shielding. Only a highly specialized siege force could breach its defenses.
technologies.name: Aspis Bastion

technologies.description: Dominating the skyline, these towering spires cast shadows across the bustling trade districts below.
technologies.name: Galactic Commerce Hub

technologies.description: Replication technology swiftly conjures up novel flavors on command.
technologies.name: Nourishment Complex

technologies.description: This massive judicial complex seamlessly intertwines courts and law enforcement.
technologies.name: Justice Complex

technologies.description: Our future lies in the sea of stars.
technologies.name: Stellar Expansion

technologies.description: The history of our galaxy warrants proper preservation in order to learn from those who came before us. An archive on the grandest scale would fit such a purpose.
technologies.name: Galactic Archivism

technologies.description: Voidspawn eggs have evolved to withstand the harsh conditions of space by absorbing and conserving energy from their nearest star.
technologies.name: Gargantuan Evolution

technologies.description: Mapping the genome of an individual through the sequencing of their DNA opens up for tailored medical treatments and therapies.
technologies.name: Genome Mapping

technologies.description: By exposing the biosphere of a planet to molecular radiation decay, we promote the growth of certain resources while turning the world into a toxic wasteland.
technologies.name: Georadiation Terraforming

technologies.description: The construction of Growth Chambers enables the organic cultivation of biological ships within the fleet.
technologies.name: Growth Chamber

technologies.description: The enhanced efficiency and capacity of Growth Chambers accelerates the cultivation of biological ships by refining their organic designs.
technologies.name: Advanced Growth Chamber

technologies.description: Through the development of macroscopic synaptic nodes, the will of the Hive will be strengthened.
technologies.name: Synaptic Structures

technologies.description: Pioneering use of holographic technology allows for the creation of artificial environments that seem as authentic as the real world. It is the next step of immersive entertainment.
technologies.name: Holo-Entertainment

technologies.description: Through the establishment of weather-controlled rural communes, we can support a larger population without disrupting our agrarian way of life.
technologies.name: Agrarian Utopias

technologies.description: Hydroponics Farming in a controlled environment allows for crops to be grown in climates where farming would normally be impossible.
technologies.name: Hydroponics Farming

technologies.description: Large-scale industrial farms growing nutrient-rich produce allows a civilization to grow its population manifold.
technologies.name: Industrial Agriculture

technologies.description: With new planetary markets comes new opportunities for commerce. Business will be booming.
technologies.name: Interplanetary Commerce

technologies.description: A body of knowledge regarding combat behaviors is useless without a strong code governing its use.
technologies.name: Interstellar Fleet Traditions

technologies.description: Calculating hyperspatial supply chains is complex. Rerouting some processing power to the task will help even the largest fleet to delve deeper into enemy territory.
technologies.name: Synaptic Cogitator

technologies.description: Dedicated facilities organize the maintenance of the Lathe's critical components, allowing us to support more chips and a healthier network environment.
technologies.name: Synaptic Sustainer

technologies.description: The organic components of the network are especially vulnerable to energetic fluctuations, which can cause rapid axonal degeneration. The Preserver strives to reduce these fluctuations to protect the Synaptic Lathe's frailer parts.
technologies.name: Synaptic Preserver

technologies.description: The utilization of basic slime-spawned lifeforms as willing test subjects greatly improves research efficiency.
technologies.name: Living Test Subjects

technologies.description: The psionic energy of the Shroud adjoins every point in the physical galaxy. The Materiality Engine exploits this interface, making it possible to reach across dimensions and materialize valuable components and resources.
technologies.name: Materiality Engine

technologies.description: Breakthroughs in bio-engineering have allowed the growth of space-faring, FTL-capable craft with military applications.
technologies.name: Maulers

technologies.description: Cognition is little but the processing of sensory input. It can be altered.
technologies.name: Neural Implants

technologies.description: When tailored to a species' genome, this form of tissue engineering has intensive neuroregenerative properties, significantly increasing the development of neurons, axons, and synapses in its recipient.
technologies.name: Neural Tissue Engineering

technologies.description: There may come a time when intellects, vast and cool and unsympathetic, regard our worlds with envy and draw plans against us. We must be ready.
technologies.name: Planetary Defenses

technologies.description: Once a colony has been firmly established and pioneers turn into citizens, the need for a strong local government providing stability trumps the colonial need for flexibility.
technologies.name: Planetary Government

technologies.description: Just like how clever pre-FTLs move to conceal each other as they approach an enemy, so too can our pilots move faster without disrupting their cloaking field.
technologies.name: Predatory Tactics

technologies.description: Are the precognitive powers of Numa at work or is it a matter of skilled craftsmanship? Either way this galactic stock market prediction model will forecast fluctuations in the economy with divine accuracy.
technologies.name: Numistic Data Modeling

technologies.description: Psionic emanations from the Shroud bring an entity's favor into corporeal reality. An empire attuned to a Shroud patron will emit a Psionic Aura from where their psionic populations are concentrated.
technologies.name: Psionic Aura

technologies.description: These small and nimble craft specialize in delivering concentrated payloads of psionic energy. The larger the target, the greater resonance its explosions achieve.
technologies.name: Psionic Bombers

technologies.description: These highly-advanced disruptors fire a powerful lance of psionic energy through enemy hulls, allowing for the targeted disabling of hostile weaponry.
technologies.name: Psionic Disruptors

technologies.description: By establishing a temporary psionic connection between one ship and another, a direct charge of mental power can be discharged to devastating effect. Such raw energy is capable of confusing ship systems and influencing the minds of the crew within.
technologies.name: Psionic Lightning

technologies.description: Devices that attenuate psionic energy are as difficult to construct as they are to understand. Such is the complexity of dealing with extradimensional forces.
technologies.name: Psionic Suppression

technologies.description: The mind is in many ways a reflection of the universe itself, a microcosmos. Not all beings will reach this level of insight, but their minds are tools greater than any other.
technologies.name: Psionic Theory

technologies.description: A genetically altered version of silicon-based bacteria could potentially be manipulated to regenerate non-organic materials.
technologies.name: Regenerative Hull Tissue

technologies.description: Nothing is quite as powerful as a well-placed insult, and we now know how to insult a species's progenitor in many languages.
technologies.name: Satisfying Insults

technologies.description: By analyzing the biological weaponry employed by the Swarm we can create self-propelled projectiles weapons spreading the very same horrific destruction.
technologies.name: Scourge Missiles

technologies.description: The Baol Organism had a unique way of producing tools. Given the species' relative slowness, they would simply grow them out of organic matter in locations that were half orchard, half factory. With the proper genetic adjustments, we could also grow various commodities and tools alongside our regular crops.
technologies.name: Baol Organic Plant

technologies.description: To build their ring world, the Cybrex relied on highly efficient mining drones to survey and harvest orbital resources. Cybrex-made memory chips and sensors could augment our own mining operations, so that we might put their millennia old algorithms to good use.
technologies.name: Cybrex Mining Hub

technologies.description: The Irassian astronaval tradition was unmatched in their time. Their shipyards produced a constant stream of ships for their navy and merchant fleets, which would ultimately be their downfall. With so many ships, and such a high reliance on them, the Irassians were powerless to quarantine the disease that would claim their empire.
technologies.name: Irassian Naval Yards

technologies.description: The sprawling empire of the First League dwarfed our own at its peak, and relied on implacable bureaucracy to keep the wheels of the state in motion. The quantic filing arrays they used afforded them unprecedented efficiency in the sorting and storing of documents.
technologies.name: First League Filing Offices

technologies.description: The reality computers of the Vultaums were unique processing units, dedicated to analyzing existence itself, not quite through physics, but rather by trying to reverse engineer reality's source code and find the glitch that would finally allow the Vultaums to take down the simulation where they believed they lived.
technologies.name: Vultaum Reality Computer

technologies.description: The Yuht were a paradoxical society, obsessed with the idea of finding other sentient species, yet refusing to accept that they were not alone. They were so focused on disproving any claim of alien life, that their bias found a way into their technology. However, with the proper modifications and calibrations, we could certainly fix their powerful detection arrays.
technologies.name: Yuht Astronomical Interferometer

technologies.description: Zro is a fascinating element, prone to chaotic bursts of energy. We believe that with the right artifacts, we could use it to fuel spatial storms over entire solar systems.
technologies.name: Zroni Storm Caster

technologies.description: Adapting the Tiyanki method of siphoning energy from gaseous matter, it is possible to construct weapons draining energy from enemy ships.
technologies.name: Frequency Tuning

technologies.description: Collecting specimens from defeated Prethoryn enables us to clone and genetically program a war-brood of our own.
technologies.name: Swarm Spawning Pools

technologies.description: The purpose of one is the purpose of all. Together, we are greater than the sum of our parts.
technologies.name: Unity of Purpose

technologies.description: These powerful immunology boosters make disease a thing of the past, allowing organic populations to live fuller, healthier lives. May cause serious side effects.
technologies.name: Universal Macrophage

technologies.description: We can develop a cure for Voidworm parasitic infection. All of our colonies would be rendered immune to their current strain of spore bombardment.
technologies.name: Voidworm Immunity

technologies.description: By encouraging the growth of deep-thinking symbionts in glades throughout our distributed self, our collective will shall be felt more keenly by all.
technologies.name: Centers of Being

technologies.description: To spread our roots to a new world first requires us to prepare the seedbed. By first terraforming a planet we can ensure that our colonies are off to a healthy start.
technologies.name: Planetary Germination

technologies.description: After analyzing a multitude of artists from drastically different cultures, we have come up with a general theorem. By studying a civilization's art and culture, we can gain an advantage against them in combat.
technologies.name: Xeno-Aesthetics

technologies.description: Given recent encounters with intelligent races, it is essential that we improve our xeno-linguistic capabilities.
technologies.name: Xeno-Linguistics

technologies.description: This corporate agency promotes a wide variety of interstellar tourist attractions, as well as offering employment packages and signing bonuses to potential emigrants interested in relocating to corporate space.
technologies.name: Xeno Outreach Agencies

technologies.description: These highly concentrated pellets of zro can be dispersed through enemy shields unabated, shifting through multiple realities. Once contact is made with a physical object, the effects are exponential in devastation.
technologies.name: Zro Launchers

technologies.description: In a carefully controlled environment, we can incubate the Genetic Material collected from culled Space Fauna and produce new members of each species under our command.
technologies.name: Artificial Breeding

technologies.description: Ping repeaters and optic diffusers with the right wavelengths can produce destructive interference and effectively scramble hostile targeting systems.
technologies.name: Ancient Target Scrambler

technologies.description: This high energy weapon causes brutal micro collapsing events on impact, generating tremendous heat and force inside its targets armor.
technologies.name: Ancient Cavitation Collapser

technologies.description: This cannon fires a barrage of ancient miniscule ionized spheres that charge upon contact with most force fields, giving them high levels of shield penetration. Any theory that these spheres could have been used for jewelry purposes were dismissed when a critical incident melted an entire laboratory.
technologies.name: Ancient Saturator Artillery

technologies.description: These cannons of gargantuan size deliver relatively slow but devastating projectiles, and can fire pretty much anything, from scrap metal, to asteroid chunks.
technologies.name: Ancient Macro Batteries

technologies.description: Particle charges, once stabilized thanks to ancient technology, allow us to create swarms of tiny missiles that still carry a respectable payload, and should be able to overwhelm most point-defense systems.
technologies.name: Ancient Nano-Missile Cloud Launcher

technologies.description: Supercharging shields can be done safely thanks to ancient stabilizer coils and dampeners. In addition to the production of a stronger force field, this also has the added benefit of outright vaporizing certain incoming projectiles.
technologies.name: Ancient Shield Overcharger

technologies.description: When it comes to tracking and shooting down missiles, these antique batteries are the best of the best, making use of a predictive algorithm written in long forgotten code to weave a fiery defensive web.
technologies.name: Ancient Defensive Web Slinger

technologies.description: Defense platforms are a cost effective way to ensure our safety, but they need to be monitored from an operation center. Fortifying our Starbase to ensure its survivability in the event of an attack, and maximizing our capacity to network independent orbital defenses would give us more time to dispatch reinforcements.
technologies.name: Ancient Rampart

technologies.description: This millennia-old processing equipment has an efficiency rate above 100%. Its functioning remains alien, but its production gains are substantial.
technologies.name: Ancient Refinery

technologies.description: These high velocity drones have been equipped with antique mining lasers that virtually ignore any plating protecting their target. A tech too good to be wasted on astro mining.
technologies.name: Ancient Driller Drones

technologies.description: Tremendous medium range firepower will enable our titans to break through enemy lines. These ancient cannons were once the foundation upon which a galactic empire was built.
technologies.name: Ancient Ruination Glare

technologies.description: Ionized plates of armor can carry a reactive charge to alleviate the energy of impacts, using magnetic repulsion and field projection principles.
technologies.name: Ancient Pulse Armor

technologies.description: Projected farther than regular shields, the suspension field technology uses ancient artifacts to slow time at the point of impact to afford the shields a longer opportunity to dispel the incoming attack's energy.
technologies.name: Ancient Suspension Field

technologies.description: Psionic emanations from the Shroud long to expand. With this new understanding, an empire's Psionic Auras can increase in intensity and spread throughout star systems, bringing benefits to allies and disadvantages to foes.
technologies.name: Psionic Aura Intensification

technologies.description: There is a way to project Psionic Auras beyond populated worlds. With the addition of an Aura Emitter, even a starbase can become a conduit for psionic emanations from the Shroud.
technologies.name: Aura Resonation

technologies.description: A facility where organic matter is converted into energy at a highly efficient rate.
technologies.name: Bio-Reactor

technologies.description: Millions of years of organic evolution will sometimes, through sheer persistence, produce elegant solutions that can also be applied to machine designs.
technologies.name: Biomechanics

technologies.description: Breakthroughs in enucleation and artificial womb technology allows for the mass-production of individuals based on a common genetic template.
technologies.name: Cloning

technologies.description: Together, we build the future.
technologies.name: Collective Production Methods

technologies.description: Calculating required resources and gear required to establish a planetary colony allows us to herd brave pioneers into grand "ark ships," confident that they will survive the long voyage across the stars to a new home.
technologies.name: New Worlds Protocol

technologies.description: A more extensive training program for new recruits, including realistic combat scenarios, prepare them for the field.
technologies.name: Combat Training

technologies.description: We have discovered how to let psionic energy flow through our ships. Armed with this knowledge, we can now imbue our vessels with the powers of our patron.
technologies.name: Mark of the Composer

technologies.description: We have discovered how to let psionic energy flow through our ships. Armed with this knowledge, we can now imbue our vessels with the powers of our patron.
technologies.name: Mark of the Cradle

technologies.description: We have discovered how to let psionic energy flow through our ships. Armed with this knowledge, we can now imbue our vessels with the powers of our patron.
technologies.name: Mark of the Eater

technologies.description: We have discovered how to let psionic energy flow through our ships. Armed with this knowledge, we can now imbue our vessels with the powers of our patron.
technologies.name: Mark of the Instrument

technologies.description: We have discovered how to let psionic energy flow through our ships. Armed with this knowledge, we can now imbue our vessels with the powers of our patron.
technologies.name: Mark of the Whisperers

technologies.description: Gradual adaptation to the realities of deep-space combat allows us to effectively coordinate larger maneuvers.
technologies.name: Doctrine: Reactive Formations

technologies.description: A fleet does not run on zeal alone. To ensure steady access to critical supplies, we should organize our logistics corps into dedicated support vessels.
technologies.name: Doctrine: Support Vessels

technologies.description: Farming techniques can be further refined through sophisticated computer simulations of different environments and weather patterns. This allows for more predictable crop yields.
technologies.name: Eco Simulation

technologies.description: Advanced DNA methylation techniques allow for functionally significant alterations to be made to arbitrary genomes.
technologies.name: Epigenetic Triggers

technologies.description: Our technology now surpasses any administrative requirement. The expertise needed to seamlessly govern a galactic empire is firmly within our reach.
technologies.name: Quantic Administration Processes

technologies.description: The Bioregeneration Institute, at the pinnacle of medical technology, pioneers groundbreaking bio-regenerative therapies, continuously redefining the boundaries of life extension.
technologies.name: Bioregeneration Institute

technologies.description: Suspended by gravimetric nullification, these domes transcend physical limitations, while advanced life support systems seamlessly cater to inhabitants' needs.
technologies.name: Empyrean Dome

technologies.description: A colossal culmination of entertainment, this nexus transcends conventional limits, where dreams materialize before desires are realized.
technologies.name: Omni-Bliss Nexus

technologies.description: This monumental planetary defense complex protects with countless armories and shielding; the planet's mountains will crumble before its defenses.
technologies.name: Aegis Complex

technologies.description: Reigning supreme in the galactic economy, the colossal spires of this trade district can be seen from orbit.
technologies.name: Interstellar Commerce Nexus

technologies.description: Every conceivable flavor can be replicated within these walls.
technologies.name: Nourishment Center

technologies.description: The zenith of legal institutions, this colossal edifice is a monument to justice, harboring courts, holding facilities, and correctional facilities that will redeem even the most hardened criminals.
technologies.name: Ziggurat of Justice

technologies.description: The colonization of alien worlds has opened up an entirely new field of biomedical research.
technologies.name: Genetic Healthcare

technologies.description: Making gene-editing tools widely available is sure to have a positive impact on our development as a species.
technologies.name: Gene Tailoring

technologies.description: There are many alien empires who would gladly seize our worlds for themselves. We must be prepared for them, should the worst come to pass.
technologies.name: Ground Defense Planning

technologies.description: By clustering networks of macroscopic synaptic nodes, maximum meganeuron transmission per available surface area can be attained.
technologies.name: Clustered Synapses

technologies.description: Seeing is believing, and belief begets reality.
technologies.name: Holographic Rituals

technologies.description: These massive entertainment complexes is where dreams come true. Shopping malls, restaurants, amusement parks, virtual arcades, and more. You dream it - we are it!
technologies.name: Hyper-Entertainment Forum

technologies.description: A meeting place for galactic powers, increasing immigration attraction and global opinion of us.
technologies.name: Interstellar Assembly

technologies.description: A well-oiled war machine is the key to exerting influence on a galactic scale. Backed by the might of our military, we can lay claim to almost anything we want.
technologies.name: Interstellar Campaigns

technologies.description: We must have to courage to seize our fate and make true what was always meant to be.
technologies.name: Manifest Destiny

technologies.description: These incubation chambers accelerate the gestation of embryonic warships within nutrient-dense biopods. Though rudimentary, they mark the first step toward a fleet that is not constructed, but grown.
technologies.name: Standardized Mauler Incubation

technologies.description: Refined incubation processes reduce maturation times and improve structural integrity of organic starships. Enhanced nutrient delivery systems and genetic tuning ensure the vessels are both swift and resilient.
technologies.name: Improved Mauler Development

technologies.description: An artistic beacon on a stellar scale, this installation inspires and represents the spirit of its creators.
technologies.name: Mega Art Installation

technologies.description: A zero-G construction yard of overwhelming proportion, capable of performing several space ship assembly projects simultaneously.
technologies.name: Mega Shipyard

technologies.description: With the latest advances in architecture, landscaping and holographic technology, we shall build the homes of the future.
technologies.name: Idyllic Architecture

technologies.description: Through the development of special penal worlds, criminals can be rehabilitated through honest, hard labor. Some may be in need of permanent rehabilitation.
technologies.name: Penal Colonies

technologies.description: Ancient warring tribes, historical nations in conflict, now unified in empire. We must not, will not, crumble.
technologies.name: Planetary Unification

technologies.description: $tech_psionic_barrier_desc.1$ psionic specialists$tech_psionic_barrier_desc.2$
technologies.name: Psionic Barrier

technologies.description: $tech_psionic_shield_desc.1$ psionic specialists$tech_psionic_shield_desc.2$
technologies.name: Psionic Shields

technologies.description: Standardizing workflows for upgrading and retrofitting ship components can lead to massive efficiency gains.
technologies.name: Refit Standards

technologies.description: The immense logistical support networks needed to maintain an upgraded Starbase can be further improved, allowing us to support more of these stations.
technologies.name: Interstellar Expansion

technologies.description: With careful study devoted to landscaping and the science of fun, the construction of entire worlds dedicated to leisure can be made possible.
technologies.name: Resort Worlds

technologies.description: Efficiency in all things.
technologies.name: Resource Processing Algorithms

technologies.description: Through the creation of special slave-breeding worlds, we can ensure that we will always have a steady supply of disposable laborers.
technologies.name: Thrall-Worlds

technologies.description: The study of alien life has moved beyond mere cataloging. By examining the structures and survival strategies of organisms evolved under foreign stars, we open new avenues in medicine, adaptation, and design.
technologies.name: Xenobiology

technologies.description: Trade across interstellar distances presents a new set of challenges to overcome. It is critical to achieve the transfer of goods from one system to another in a timely and above all cost efficient manner.
technologies.name: Offworld Trade Companies

technologies.description: A facility synchronizing the national Starbase network, augmenting defensive and offensive capabilities.
technologies.name: Strategic Coordination Center

technologies.description: Deep-tissue implants are the latest innovation in the revolutionary overlapping of sensory engineering and entertainment experiences. "Where we're going, we won't need skin to feel!"
technologies.name: Subdermal Stimulation

technologies.description: Thinking outside the box merely places you in another, somewhat larger box.
technologies.name: Synthetic Thought Patterns

technologies.description: $tech_telepathy_desc.1$ the mind is capable of connecting to other individuals, becoming something greater.
technologies.name: Telepathy

technologies.description: Where the body fails, science intervenes.
technologies.name: Vitality Boosters

technologies.description: Building on the foundations of early bio-engineering, Weavers are crafted to balance agility with increased combat capabilities.
technologies.name: Weavers

technologies.description: We can accelerate the fluency of global, collective thought by investing it in gatherings of symbionts whose sole purpose in life is to facilitate that same will.
technologies.name: Clustered Synapses

technologies.description: The progress we make calls for a new, nimbler form of administration that may aid rather than hinder us in our pursuits.
technologies.name: Adaptive Bureaucracy

technologies.description: A facility where organic matter is converted into energy at a highly efficient rate, improvements in waste collection allows harvesting of useful gaseous by-products.
technologies.name: Advanced Bio-Reactor

technologies.description: As our planets become more developed, we can gain significant improvements to our throughput.
technologies.name: Improved Production

technologies.description: Robust frameworks for local governance created on a per-case basis, to meet each colony's needs.
technologies.name: Colonial Centralization

technologies.description: By adjusting atmospheric filtering on a per-site basis to better filter out undesirable elements, colonial living conditions may be improved.
technologies.name: Atmospheric Filtering

technologies.description: Restructuring the chain of command and deciding what interdependencies are set between officers, make fleets more responsive and effective.
technologies.name: Command Matrix

technologies.description: We can increase the effectiveness of our Space Fauna Ships by modifying their genomes, allowing us to integrate artificial technology into their biomass.
technologies.name: Controlled Mutations

technologies.description: An understanding of a shared past is necessary in order to make any significant strides into the future.
technologies.name: Sociocultural History

technologies.description: Tactical disruption of natural habitats combined with converging search-and-destroy patterns can effectively eliminate hostile wildlife in a very short span of time.
technologies.name: Dangerous Wildlife Removal

technologies.description: Many planets exhibit extensive subsurface voids. Subterranean exploration, exploitation, and construction techniques can greatly increase the habitable area of some worlds.
technologies.name: Subterranean Colonization

technologies.description: Thorough cataloging, gene sequencing, and computer modeling of exobotanical ecosystems, coupled with gene editing and dispersal mechanisms, will allow us to reshape alien plant communities to our liking.
technologies.name: Selective Defoliants

technologies.description: Gradual adaptation to the realities of deep-space combat allows us to effectively coordinate larger maneuvers.
technologies.name: Doctrine: Interstellar Warfare

technologies.description: Amateurs talk about tactics. Professionals study logistics. By ensuring our fleets are regularly and efficiently supplied, we can increase the number of vessels we can effectively support.
technologies.name: Doctrine: Interstellar Logistics

technologies.description: Improved food processing techniques will lead to better preservation methods and less spoilage.
technologies.name: Food Processing

technologies.description: Further improvements to administration grant an extended power projection across the stars, and the military clout needed to enforce our demands.
technologies.name: Galactic Campaigns

technologies.description: Gene Banks filter and curate available genomes for deployment in clones.
technologies.name: Gene Banks

technologies.description: Sophisticated genetic engineering of crops helps increase yield and further improves both taste and nutrient levels.
technologies.name: Gene Crops

technologies.description: Stricter control of RNA and protein production on the cellular level.
technologies.name: Targeted Gene Expressions

technologies.description: Nucleotide purification techniques allow for the isolation and refinement of particularly desirable genetic traits.
technologies.name: Gene Seed Purification

technologies.description: Through glandular biological tailoring we can change the environmental tolerance of a species to suit our needs.
technologies.name: Glandular Acclimation

technologies.description: The strategic value of a good defense remains as relevant today as it was to our predecessors in the far distant past. Technology does not render fortifications obsolete - it merely changes their requirements.
technologies.name: Global Defense Grid

technologies.description: Harbingers represent a significant leap in bio-engineered warfare, blending formidable firepower with the resilience of living technology. These ships serve as the backbone of the fleet.
technologies.name: Harbingers

technologies.description: We can improve the artificial growth processes established in our hatcheries, accelerating the early developmental stages in order to create more mature clones.
technologies.name: Improved Incubators

technologies.description: As we journeyed into the cosmos and ventured beyond our home system, we also entered a new era of economics. New markets are appearing a startling rate, and economic theorists are struggling to keep up.
technologies.name: Interstellar Economics

technologies.description: Orbital systems of mirrors and shades can effect dramatic changes in planetary climates, when managed properly.
technologies.name: Climate Control Network

technologies.description: These facilities yield vessels of unparalleled vitality and adaptive capacity. Optimized genetic matrices and advanced biotechnological support guarantee unmatched performance in the void.
technologies.name: Advanced Mauler Development

technologies.description: $tech_mine_zro_desc.1$ ingested $tech_mine_zro_desc.2$ individuals$tech_mine_zro_desc.3$ drug $tech_mine_zro_desc.4$
technologies.name: Zro Distillation

technologies.description: From its cradle as a purely pharmaceutical venture, advancements in our understanding of the morphogenetic field allow for direct, subconscious interfaces with organic units.
technologies.name: Morphogenetic Field Mastery

technologies.description: With the advent of clean fusion, automation, and matter compression technologies, it was only a matter of time before mountain top removal became mountain range removal.
technologies.name: Planetary Resurfacing

technologies.description: Sapient races have been reclaiming swampland for thousands of years. A coordinated system of modular aqueducts, pump stations, chemical remediation crawlers and automated soil compactors can reclaim land at unprecedented speeds.
technologies.name: Xeno-Hydraulic Mastery

technologies.description: An arcane catalyst amplifying certain psionic wavelengths, capable of inducing hallucinations (religious experiences) in biological brains, and severe disruption (brain death) in electronic ones.
technologies.name: Divine Stimulus

technologies.description: Advances in the field of Psionics suggest the possibility of creating combat computers capable of reading and analyzing the impulses of telepathic operatives before they are cognitively processed.
technologies.name: Precognition Interface

technologies.description: The process of soil deposition normally takes millions of years. With advanced fracking, chemical engineering, and hydraulic management technologies even the poorest substrate can be turned into fertile topsoil.
technologies.name: Soil Remediation

technologies.description: Iterating on the standard conditioning regimen for ground troops has proven to make them more effective in direct combat.
technologies.name: Aggressive Conditioning

technologies.description: Careful tuning of pain receptors allow soldiers to fight through what would previously have been debilitating injuries.
technologies.name: Nerve Dampeners

technologies.description: Regimens of periodic cell revitalization treatments keep the leader class spry and active beyond traditionally expected lifespans.
technologies.name: Cell Revitalization

technologies.description: Careful reproductive planning should be incentivized, lest we waste valuable genetic legacies.
technologies.name: Selected Lineages

technologies.description: Through recursive axonal scaffolding and synaptic reticulation, we have developed methods for reorganizing the electrochemical topology of conscious matter. Neurons do not merely transmit - they entwine, organize, and remember. Now, they do so according to our design.
technologies.name: Neural Weaving

technologies.description: There is no simple solution to the problem of macro-scale reshaping of planetary crusts - only bigger trowels and orbitally-deployed drills.
technologies.name: Terrestrial Sculpting

technologies.description: Telepaths can monitor the citizenry for incorrect thoughts, but with some study they could also correct thought aberrations that they find.
technologies.name: Thought Enforcement

technologies.description: Given enough processing power, networked sensors and distributed stations, even the ocean currents can be managed to a fine level of control.
technologies.name: Ocean Ecology Management

technologies.description: Advances in material technology and deep-shaft mining techniques allow geo-engineering at previously unthinkable depths and temperatures. Magma hotspots can now be exploited, suppressed, or even relocated.
technologies.name: Deep Crust Engineering

technologies.description: Biologically enhanced projectiles are fired, countering evasive maneuvers and striking agile targets.
technologies.name: Vector Lock Cannon

technologies.description: Launches organic projectiles that release specialized enzymes, interfering with enemy weapon reloading systems and reducing their rate of fire.
technologies.name: Reload Jammer

technologies.description: Organic projectiles imbued with destabilizing enzymes scramble enemy targeting systems and reduce their accuracy.
technologies.name: Gloom Spores

technologies.description: Fires bio-projectiles that emit bursts of energy upon impact, subtly enhancing the maneuverability of our vessels.
technologies.name: Energy Burster

technologies.description: Fires organic projectiles that emit energizing biofields, subtly increasing the firing speed of weapons systems.
technologies.name: Weaver Biofield Generators

technologies.description: Regenerative pods are launched to deliver strong healing compounds to allied ships.
technologies.name: Spore Launcher

technologies.description: These facilities nurture mid-sized biological ships within refined biopods, employing enhanced nutrient delivery and genetic optimization to produce agile and adaptable vessels for the fleet.
technologies.name: Standardized Weaver Incubation

technologies.description: These facilities employ enhanced bio-engineering techniques to accelerate growth cycles and enhance vessel adaptability. Improved genetic matrices and optimized environments ensure these biological ships are both durable and highly responsive in combat.
technologies.name: Improved Weaver Development

technologies.description: Continuous, asynchronous analysis of disparate data sets allows for the accurate modeling of hitherto-unpredictable fluctuations in social currents.
technologies.name: Automated Curation Algorithms

technologies.description: Semi-independent units have proved critical to the success of the greater whole.
technologies.name: Autonomous Agents

technologies.description: We leave nothing to chance, no matter the cost. Through exacting curation of DNA banks do we build the leaders of tomorrow.
technologies.name: Capacity Boosters

technologies.description: Increased population density gives us an opportunity to further increase productivity.
technologies.name: Efficiencies of Scale

technologies.description: By advancing our understanding of atmospheric transformation, we will be able to terraform even the most ecologically devastated worlds.
technologies.name: Climate Restoration

technologies.description: Finding aspects of the self within the group is natural and inevitable; eventually those shared aspects must be valued higher than individual identities.
technologies.name: The Collective Self

technologies.description: Local administrative developments allow for closer supervision of colonial affairs without excessively burdening central decision-making.
technologies.name: Colonial Bureaucracy

technologies.description: Further study into the hazardous environments found on other planets help alleviate the difficulties that colonizers encounter in their day-to-day lives on foreign worlds.
technologies.name: Hostile Environment Adaptation

technologies.description: Through our understanding of physics and field manipulation, our holy places shall we seen and felt by all.
technologies.name: Consecration Fields

technologies.description: We can go further. Advanced manipulation of Space Fauna genetics allows for integrating a wider variety of specialized components.
technologies.name: Advanced Controlled Mutations

technologies.description: Gradual adaptation to the realities of deep-space combat allows us to effectively coordinate larger maneuvers.
technologies.name: Doctrine: Fluid Fleet Templates

technologies.description: By maintaining a professional corps of fleet liaisons, we can improve communications and the flow of orders throughout the chain of command.
technologies.name: Doctrine: Fleet Liaisons

technologies.description: By adapting planetary ecosystems to large-scale environmental changes we can turn terraformation into a less disruptive process.
technologies.name: Ecological Adaptation

technologies.description: Improved algorithms for processing and organizing vast amounts of data has streamlined decision-making and information-sharing throughout the empire.
technologies.name: Effective Bureaucracy

technologies.description: When survival itself is at stake, the very concept of war loses its meaning. These campaigns are waged not for dominion, but to secure the continued existence of our civilization.
technologies.name: Existential Campaigns

technologies.description: A Federation must be more than goodwill and shared ambition. This code provides the groundwork for a unified interstellar order, ensuring cooperation and stability among its members.
technologies.name: Federation Code

technologies.description: New cryopreservation and protein resequencing methods will make food processing much more efficient.
technologies.name: Advanced Food Processing

technologies.description: As our empire grows, so does our understanding of biology. Advanced medical treatments on a cellular level have allowed for significant advancements in biological population health.
technologies.name: Cyto-Revitalization

technologies.description: The administrative needs of a star empire are as numerous as they are complex. We will rise to the occasion.
technologies.name: Galactic Administration

technologies.description: By engaging in free trade of goods and services we allow for a more specialized economy, where an individual can excel in a narrow field and trade for their needs.
technologies.name: Galactic Markets

technologies.description: Planets are big and production sites are often separated by vast distances. A coherent strategy for making certain that everyone is pulling in the same direction is often needed.
technologies.name: Global Production Strategy

technologies.description: These facilities nurture large biological ships, feeding them through advanced nutrient infusion to ensure resilience and combat readiness.
technologies.name: Standardized Harbinger Incubation

technologies.description: Refined facilities employ sophisticated bio-engineering techniques to accelerate growth and enhance structural integrity. The resulting vessels feature improved endurance and increased combat efficiency.
technologies.name: Improved Harbinger Development

technologies.description: Physical reminders of how far we have come both instill a reverence for past achievements and bolster ambitions for the future.
technologies.name: Heritage Sites

technologies.description: The will of the Hive will be further strengthened and coordinated with the expansion and development of a massive nervous center of meganeurons.
technologies.name: Confluence of Thought

technologies.description: The Empire lives, the Empire breathes. We may make up its body, but it is not for the left hand to know what the right hand is doing.
technologies.name: The Living State

technologies.description: Improvements to the metabolic gases within our hatcheries will further mature each specimen before it is brought into this world.
technologies.name: Metabolic Gases

technologies.description: Infusing crop strands with small amounts of nano-machines help create a type of produce that is ultra resilient, and the chemical composition of which can be tailored and altered during its entire lifetime.
technologies.name: Nano-Vitality Crops

technologies.description: As the galactic stage evolves, so too should our operational instincts. Any evolutionary niche that no longer gives an advantage will be culled.
technologies.name: Rudimentary Node Culling

technologies.description: Self-determination protocols and guidance algorithms can become obsolete in a rapidly developing galactic stage. Like any junk data, they shall be overwritten.
technologies.name: Rudimentary Node Reformatting

technologies.description: Stronger alloys allow us to create prefabricated buildings, providing our colonies with the improved infrastructure.
technologies.name: Ceramo-Metal Infrastructure

technologies.description: The Psi Jump Drive harnesses the psi energies emitted by the crew to force the vessel through the very fabric of reality, instantly "jumping" vast distances.
technologies.name: Psi Jump Drive

technologies.description: Transgenic crops offer the nutritional elements of several standard food crops in one convenient package.
technologies.name: Transgenic Crops

technologies.description: Life, in all its staggering variety, is composed of repeating patterns and modular structures. By decoding and replicating these at every scale, we now wield a holistic blueprint of biology. There is little left in nature we do not understand, and less still we cannot recreate.
technologies.name: Biostructural Synthesis

technologies.description: Stingers are designed to deliver devastating strikes against high-value targets. They excel in exploiting weaknesses in enemy defenses.
technologies.name: Stingers

technologies.description: Fires refined projectiles with superior tracking enzymes and adaptive flight paths, increasing hit rates against fast-moving targets.
technologies.name: Enzymatic Webcaster

technologies.description: Enhances disruption enzymes to interfere more effectively with reloading cycles, significantly delaying enemy volleys.
technologies.name: Fire Disrupter

technologies.description: Refined biological compounds disrupt targeting systems and short-range communications, sowing chaos among enemy ranks.
technologies.name: Tangle Pulse

technologies.description: Releases concentrated bio-energetic fields, further boosting the evasion capabilities of our ships.
technologies.name: Tangler Pod Launcher

technologies.description: Refined bio-munitions enhance biofield intensity, further accelerating the rate of fire.
technologies.name: Weaver Booster Blaster

technologies.description: Highly efficient pods imbued with healing biomatter are deployed to rapidly repair damage across multiple vessels.
technologies.name: Improved Spore Launcher

technologies.description: These facilities produce biological ships of unparalleled precision and versatility. Revolutionary growth techniques and adaptive genetic enhancements result in vessels that thrive in even the most demanding tactical scenarios.
technologies.name: Advanced Weaver Development

technologies.description: Our mutualistic will shall be strengthened by vast gatherings of deeply empathic symbionts, so in-tune with their surroundings as to concentrate and re-broadcast our collective thought.
technologies.name: Confluence of Thought

technologies.description: Continued advancements in technology allow our most developed planets to reach productivity levels unheard of in earlier times.
technologies.name: Maximized Productivity

technologies.description: Psi-Phase Field Generators focus the psionic potential of the ship's crew to partially phase the vessel into the Shroud. This allows the ship to remain undetected by all but the best sensor arrays, though what the crew may be forced to witness is better left unsaid.
technologies.name: Psi-Phase Field Generator

technologies.description: Extensive study into different soil types and their ability to support crops will help improve the living conditions of our settlers on foreign worlds.
technologies.name: Foreign Soil Enrichment

technologies.description: A YDeep Space Citadel! is an armored Starbase designed for maximum defense within a stellar gravity well.
technologies.name: Deep Space Citadel

technologies.description: Gradual adaptation to the realities of deep-space combat allows us to effectively coordinate larger maneuvers.
technologies.name: Doctrine: Armada Battle Formation

technologies.description: Initiative and some measure of ambition must be promoted in our autonomous leader units, while still making certain that they do not stray too far from the directives of the core intelligence.
technologies.name: Embodied Dynamism

technologies.description: Multiple administrative strata efficiently surface only the most vital information to the upper levels of government.
technologies.name: Galactic Bureaucracy

technologies.description: Advanced incubation systems produce biological ships of exceptional durability and firepower. Genetic fine-tuning and superior growth environments create vessels capable of dominating the battlefield with unmatched resilience.
technologies.name: Advanced Harbinger Development

technologies.description: Not all research into faster-than-light communication channels produces useful results, but some outcomes may find new purpose in bringing our people together.
technologies.name: Local Hypercommunication

technologies.description: Once removed, a replacement node is encouraged to grow within the proper environment. The secret is to feed it the previous node.
technologies.name: Basic Node Culling

technologies.description: Every self-iterating algorithm has its value. We will not allow important learning go to waste when restoring our leaders.
technologies.name: Basic Node Reformatting

technologies.description: The process of synthetically replicating crops requires a lot of collected waste to create a small amount of produce, but nevertheless provides a significant boost to agricultural output.
technologies.name: Nutrient Replication

technologies.description: Advances in metallurgy permit us to build vastly larger and more durable structures, greatly improving the infrastructure of our colonies.
technologies.name: Durasteel Infrastructure

technologies.description: Improved fleet management procedures will free up the resources needed to maintain a bigger fleet.
technologies.name: Fleet Management Procedures

technologies.description: These facilities grow sleek, agile biological ships designed for precision and speed. Employing advanced biopods and specialized nutrient solutions, they produce vessels capable of precise and efficient strikes.
technologies.name: Standardized Stinger Incubation

technologies.description: Refined facilities accelerate growth cycles and improve bio-engineered precision, resulting in vessels with superior maneuverability and accuracy. These enhancements make the Stinger a devastating force in tactical engagements.
technologies.name: Improved Stinger Development

technologies.description: Through comprehensive study of irradiated environments we will allow our settlers to colonize worlds that have been devastated by nuclear warfare.
technologies.name: Tomb World Adaptation

technologies.description: Leaving our planetary cradle has opened us up to a new understanding of faith, and its place in a wider context.
technologies.name: Metacognitive Faith

technologies.description: Redundant thought centers allow for a Crystalline Entity to split itself in two as a final gambit to protect its clutch against a particularly dangerous foe.
technologies.name: Fissile Cores

technologies.description: The powerful digestive system of a Cutholoid can be repurposed to fire kinetic projectiles at extremely high velocity.
technologies.name: Gastric Fountain

technologies.description: On death, the Tiyanki Matriarch produces an assortment of protective chemicals in a final attempt to preserve the lives of her remaining kin.
technologies.name: Restorative Enzymes

technologies.description: Modified Flagella spawn that siphon nutrients and materials from their prey in order to support the regeneration of their host Amoeba.
technologies.name: Leechcraft

technologies.description: A main source of energy for large creatures in deep space comes from the power of starlight. The closer they are to brighter stars, the faster they develop.
technologies.name: Starborne Biology

technologies.description: The somber song of the Tiyanki inspires its fellow creatures, hardening their resolve in combat.
technologies.name: Herdsong Chords

technologies.description: Cysts filled with reproductive fluid allow for each Voidworm in a fertile Troika to independently produce spawn when bombarding an inhabited planet.
technologies.name: Virulent Cysts

technologies.description: Deploys self-guided bio-munitions that lock onto movement patterns, ensuring accuracy against elusive enemies.
technologies.name: Seeker Shard Array

technologies.description: Deploys intelligent bio-projectiles that target critical reloading systems, creating cascading delays across enemy fleets.
technologies.name: Mind Missiles

technologies.description: Adaptive bio-munitions are deployed to exploit neural weaknesses in both organic and synthetic crews, crippling enemy efficiency.
technologies.name: Neuro Scourge

technologies.description: Launches intelligent bio-projectiles that adaptively enhance agility, ensuring superior evasion even in the most chaotic battles.
technologies.name: Agile Spike Array

technologies.description: Deploys adaptive bio-projectiles that amplify reaction times and system efficiency, enabling a significant increase in fire rate.
technologies.name: Weaver Organo-Tech Amplifier

technologies.description: Pods containing repair agents are launched, optimizing healing based on the severity of damage and ensuring no vulnerabilities remain.
technologies.name: Advanced Spore Launcher

technologies.description: Advancing our understanding of interactions with - and manipulations of - the xeno is a necessary step in forming more permanent interstellar alliances.
technologies.name: Xeno Diplomacy

technologies.description: Additional study into different planetary climates will allow us to settle our population on worlds previously thought too hostile to support them.
technologies.name: Eco-Integration Studies

technologies.description: Culling an entire node is very inefficient. Instead, just trim the divergent and unwanted lobes.
technologies.name: Advanced Node Culling

technologies.description: Using a failed piece of software to develop its successor enables quick reconstruction. Learning from faulty memory pathways generates even more advanced council directives.
technologies.name: Advanced Node Reformatting

technologies.description: Improving the support staff available to our commanders will increase the number of ships they can lead in a single fleet.
technologies.name: Admiralty Support Staff

technologies.description: Restructuring the managerial web linking core worlds to the capital can help alleviate the administrative stressors and information chokepoints that frequently arise within a budding empire.
technologies.name: Administrative Efficiency

technologies.description: The apex of bioship growth technology, these advanced facilities produce Stingers of unmatched speed and lethality. Optimized genetic templates and cutting-edge incubation techniques ensure these ships dominate any battlefield with swift and deadly precision.
technologies.name: Advanced Stinger Development

technologies.description: Further advancements in the field of subdermal implants can provide detailed information regarding the movements and actions of the implanted.
technologies.name: Tracking Implants

technologies.description: Utilizes complex organic targeting systems that anticipate evasive actions, making even the most agile prey vulnerable.
technologies.name: Pinion Accelerator

technologies.description: Utilizes adaptive biological compounds that degrade reloading mechanisms, halving the firing efficiency of even the most advanced weaponry.
technologies.name: Degradation Beams

technologies.description: Intelligent bio-projectiles emit disruptive fields on impact, scrambling enemy targeting systems and causing widespread malfunctions.
technologies.name: Ruin Barbs

technologies.description: Deploys advanced munitions that generate dynamic bio-electric auras, significantly improving the ability of ships to evade enemy fire.
technologies.name: Electro Sprayer

technologies.description: Generates dynamic bio-electric auras, vastly enhancing firing speed across multiple vessels, ensuring relentless pressure on enemy fleets.
technologies.name: Weaver Aura Caster

technologies.description: Pods that saturate the battlefield with adaptive spores provide smart healing to all allied vessels within range.
technologies.name: Adaptive Spore Launcher

technologies.description: The complexities of interstellar diplomacy necessitate the forming of bonds with foreign powers in order to further one's goals.
technologies.name: Xeno Relations

technologies.description: Increasing the speed at which fighter pilots can process and act upon enemy positioning data elevates strike craft a few steps up the food chain.
technologies.name: Synapse Interceptors

technologies.description: By collecting and analyzing the performance data of the pilots that came before, we have exponentially improved our pilot training methods. Each one will be quicker than the one that came before.
technologies.name: Iterative Pilot Training

technologies.description: Fires intelligent bio-projectiles equipped with predictive tracking, overcoming the most sophisticated evasion protocols.
technologies.name: Prey Tracker

technologies.description: Fires advanced munitions that emit suppression fields, crippling enemy reloading systems and rendering them painfully slow.
technologies.name: Fiend Disabler

technologies.description: Advanced biological ordnance creates a cascading feedback loop within enemy systems, rendering their attacks wildly ineffective.
technologies.name: Snare Darts

technologies.description: Fires highly advanced projectiles that create large-scale enhancement fields, granting unparalleled evasion to fleets.
technologies.name: Evasion Darts

technologies.description: Unleashes hyper-charged bio-munitions that create large-scale enhancement fields, enabling fleets to unleash sustained, rapid-fire barrages.
technologies.name: Weaver Swift Shooter

technologies.description: Deploys pods that unleash a wave of intelligent microorganisms, capable of revitalizing even the most damaged fleets.
technologies.name: Intelligent Adaptive Spore Launcher

technologies.description: Deploys bio-plasma rounds that adapt mid-flight, guaranteeing hits against even the most erratic maneuvers.
technologies.name: Precision Lancer

technologies.description: Releases a biological pulse that locks down enemy reloading for extended periods.
technologies.name: Tracker Stopper

technologies.description: Bio-electromagnetic pulses incapacitate targeting systems and leave fleets in a state of disarray.
technologies.name: Havoc Storm

technologies.description: Fires bio-munitions that emit fields of adaptive energy, allowing fleets to dance effortlessly out of harm's way.
technologies.name: Adaptive Tendrils

technologies.description: Projects waves of bio-energy that push our weaponry to their peak performance, flooding the battlefield with devastating firepower.
technologies.name: Weaver Wave Maker

technologies.description: Pods filled with malleable cells are launched to trigger the growth of new hull tissues, pushing the endurance of organic vessels beyond their former limits.
technologies.name: Rebirth Spores
